data.title: New post title
data.excerpt: Cloud Translation can dynamically translate text between thousands of language pairs. Translation lets websites and programs programmatically integrate with the translation service. For an overview of the service, see the Translation overview. Translation is offered in two editions (Basic and Advanced) with their own pricing plans. Cloud Code is a set of IDE plug-ins that help you stay productive when developing cloud-native applications. In this episode of Exploring Cloud. What if we told you that you could easily translate audio or video with just an API? In this episode of AI Adventures, we show you how to use the Media Translation API to deliver high quality, real-time speech translation for your application.
data.author: Jared Yee
